name: Lucus
string:
Hey, <player>.
Can you do me
a favor?

name: Lucus
string:
I want to make
a big chest, but
I'm short of
materials. Can I
buy a log from
you?

 Yes          No<ask>

name: Lucus
string:
Thanks. I'd
appreciate it if
you could bring
it today.

name: Lucus
string:
It's alright.
You're busy…

name: Lucus
string:
Oh, Thanks. Here
is 300G. Now I
can finish the
chest.

name: Lucus
string:
Did you bring
the log? Please
bring it as soon
as you can.

name: Cozy
string:
Hi <player>. Good
timing. Can I
ask you a favor?
My business is
not doing well.
So, I need an
attractive fish
that catches
everyone's heart
and never let's
it go. Elder
told me that
there is a fish
called the
'King of Lake'.
Can you go catch
it and bring it
here by 6PM the
day after
tomorrow?
I've prepared a
tank especially
for that fish.

name: Cozy
string:
No King of Lake
yet? By 6PM the
day after
tomorrow, OK?
I won't put any
other fish in my
special tank.

name: Cozy
string:
No King of Lake
yet? By 6PM
tomorrow, OK?
I won't put any
other fish in my
special tank.

name: Cozy
string:
No King of Lake
yet? Today by
6PM, OK? I won't
put any other
fish in my
special tank.

name: Cozy
string:
Wow! This is the
King of Lake!!
How mysterious!
Thank you!

name: Cozy
string:
…Never mind.
It was stupid of
me to expect the
fish from you.

name: Cozy
string:
Thank you.
I will take
good care of it.

name: Lukia
string:
Hi <player>. Can I
ask you a
question? My mom
is sick, and a
doctor called
Isha told me
that the Full
Moon Flower
extract is good
for her. Do you
know where I can
find the flower?

name: Lukia
string:
Do you know
where I can
find the Full
Moon Flower?

name: Lukia
string:
Is that really
the Full Moon
Flower!? You've
brought it for
me? Thank you
<player>! You're so
nice!

name: Lukia
string:
I can imagine
how happy my mom
is going to be.

name: Lyla
string:
Hi <player>.
Welcome. Ah…
can you please
do me a favor?

 Yes          No<ask>

name: Lyla
string:
I went to the
island with my
friend the other
day. I loved
playing with the
animals and
walking in
nature. It was
so much fun that
we lost track of
time and missed
the ferry. But,
a fisherman
named Billy
helped us out.
Since then, I
can't stop
thinking about
his sweet smile.
…It was love
at first sight.
The ocean is so
cold in the
winter, I want
to knit a
scarf for him…
Can you spare me
some yarn?

 Yes          No<ask>

name: Lyla
string:
…OK. You're not
very friendly…

name: Lyla
string:
I'm not in a
hurry or
anything, but
I'd like to have
it by the end of
the month.

name: Lyla
string:
No yarn yet?
It's going to be
too late.

name: Lyla
string:
Thank you <player>.
I'll knit a nice
one.

name: Lyla
string:
Knitting a scarf
is very hard for
me, but I'll try
my best for
Billy.

name: Lyla
string:
It's getting
cold. I have to
finish up the
scarf…

name: Lyla
string:
I'm finally done
with the scarf.
I used a lot of
yarn so it's
really warm. I'm
very nervous
about giving it
to Billy, but I
don't want to
waste your nice
yarn. I'll give
it to him on
25th after
work.
Wish me luck.

name: Lyla
string:
Thank you, <player>.
Wish me luck.

name: Lyla
string:
Ah <player>. Thank
you very much
for everything
the other day.
I went to see
Billy on the
25th. He
remembered me,
and he loved
the scarf too.
…I told him
how I feel about
him…but, he is
in love with
someone else…
But I feel much
better now that
I told him. I
appreciate what
you've done for
me <player>. Thank
you very much.

name: Lyla
string:
My wish didn't
come true, but
I appreciate
what you've done
for me <player>.

name: Lyla
string:
I don't need the
yarn any more.
It's too late to
start knitting.

name: Lyla
string:
I don't want to
see you for a
while. Can you
please leave?

name: Cozy
string:
Is it possible
that I have all
the fish…?
Yes! I do! I do
have all the
fish in my tank!
Good job <player>!
I will make the
aquarium better
than ever! It's
all thanks to
you <player>! Oh,
this is for you.
It's a strange
fruit called a
Power Berry.
Some salesman
talked me into
buying it.
I don't have
anything else I
can give you,
but I really
appreciate what
you've done for
me! Come to see
me and the fish
any time!

name: <player>
string:
<var>0 might
have a baby
today… I will
be a father…
<name>eHello? Is this
<var>0's farm?

name: Nancy
string:
Ah, hello <player>.
Where is <var>0?

name: Nancy
string:
Oh, <var>0!
Oh, no… …
… … … …
…ah… and…
… … … …
… fine… OK!

name: Nancy
string:
<player>, where is
the kitchen?

name: Nancy
string:
One more little
push… Hang in
there <var>0.
… … … …
A little more…
… … … …
There you go!

name: Nancy
string:
Congratulations
<player>. Your son
is healthy and
beautiful. Go
see <var>0. She
did wonderfully.
Anyway, what
happened to the
doctor…? Did
he get lost…?

name: Nancy
string:
Congratulations
<player>. Your
daughter is so
beautiful. Go
see <var>0. She
did wonderfully.
Anyway, what
happened to the
doctor…? Did
he get lost…?

name: <partner>
string:
<player>… This is
our baby. Oh,
please give him
a nice name.

name: <partner>
string:
One more member
in our family.
…I'm so happy.
We are going to
have a wonderful
future together,
Daddy!
